product_name: The North Face Mountain View Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The North Face Mountain View Triclimate 3-in-1 jacket surrounds toddler girls in warmth and waterproof, breathable protection when she ventures out the door to explore a winter wonderland. Shell jacket and insulating fleece liner jacket can be worn together for the ultimate in waterproof warmth, or either piece can be worn solo as the weather warrants. Polyester shell with a HyVent(R) waterproof, breathable coating and fully sealed seams help ensure dry comfort. Removable fleece liner jacket inside shell adds warmth without too much bulkiness; liner jacket attaches to shell jacket through zip-in and snap-in compatibility. Fixed hood; zippered hand pockets; ID label; key clip; secure internal pocket; drawcord hem; rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs.
short_description: The North Face Mountain View Triclimate 3-in-1 jacket surrounds toddler girls in warmth and waterproof, breathable protection when she ventures out the door to explore a winter wonderland.
subcategory: Skiwear And Snowboard -- Boys And Girls
